origin.originlayer.human.name: Human
origin.originlayer.human.description: A regular human. Your ordinary Minecraft experience awaits.
origin.originlayer.merling.name: Merling
origin.originlayer.merling.description: These natural inhabitants of the ocean are not used to being out of the water for too long.
origin.originlayer.arachnid.name: Arachnid
origin.originlayer.arachnid.description: Their climbing abilities and the ability to trap their foes in spiderweb make the Arachnid perfect hunters.
origin.originlayer.blazeborn.name: Blazeborn
origin.originlayer.blazeborn.description: Late descendants of the Blaze, the Blazeborn are naturally immune to the perils of the Nether.
origin.originlayer.avian.name: Avian
origin.originlayer.avian.description: The Avian race has lost their ability to fly a long time ago. Now these peaceful creatures can be seen gliding from one place to another.
origin.originlayer.phantom.name: Phantom
origin.originlayer.phantom.description: As half-human and half-phantom beings, these creatures can switch between a Phantom and a normal form.
origin.originlayer.feline.name: Feline
origin.originlayer.feline.description: With their cat-like appearance, the Feline scare creepers away. With the dexterity of cats, they always land safely on their feet.
origin.originlayer.elytrian.name: Elytrian
origin.originlayer.elytrian.description: Often flying around in the winds, Elytrians are uncomfortable when they don't have enough space above their head.
origin.originlayer.enderian.name: Enderian
origin.originlayer.enderian.description: Born as children of the Ender Dragon, Enderians are capable of teleporting but are vulnerable to water.
origin.originlayer.shulk.name: Shulk
origin.originlayer.shulk.description: Related to Shulkers, the bodies of the Shulk are outfitted with a protective shell-like skin.
power.originlayer.water_breathing.name: Gills
power.originlayer.water_breathing.descri: You can breathe underwater, but not on land.
power.originlayer.aqua_affinity.name: Aqua Affinity
power.originlayer.aqua_affinity.descript: You may break blocks underwater as others do on land.
power.originlayer.water_vision.name: Wet Eyes
power.originlayer.swim_speed.name: Fins
power.originlayer.like_water.name: Like Water
power.originlayer.like_water.description: When underwater, you do not sink to the ground unless you want to.
power.originlayer.fragile.name: Fragile
power.originlayer.fragile.description: You have 3 less hearts of health than humans.
power.originlayer.webbing.name: Webbing
power.originlayer.webbing.description: When you hit an enemy in melee, they get stuck in cobweb.
power.originlayer.climbing.name: Climbing
power.originlayer.climbing.description: You are able to climb up any kind of wall, not just ladders.
power.originlayer.carnivore.name: Carnivore
power.originlayer.carnivore.description: Your diet is restricted to meat, you can't eat vegetables.
power.originlayer.fire_immunity.name: Fire Immunity
power.originlayer.fire_immunity.descript: You are immune to all types of fire damage.
power.originlayer.nether_spawn.name: Nether Inhabitant
power.originlayer.nether_spawn.descripti: Your natural spawn will be in the Nether.
power.originlayer.burning_wrath.name: Burning Wrath
power.originlayer.burning_wrath.descript: When on fire, you deal additional damage with your attacks.
power.originlayer.hotblooded.name: Hotblooded
power.originlayer.hotblooded.description: Due to your hot body, venoms burn up, making you immune to poison and hunger status effects.
power.originlayer.water_vulnerability.de: You receive damage over time while in contact with water.
power.originlayer.tailwind.name: Tailwind
power.originlayer.tailwind.description: You are a little bit quicker on foot than others.
power.originlayer.slow_falling.name: Featherweight
power.originlayer.slow_falling.descripti: You fall as gently to the ground as a feather would, unless you sneak.
power.originlayer.vegetarian.name: Vegetarian
power.originlayer.fresh_air.name: Fresh Air
power.originlayer.fresh_air.description: When sleeping, your bed needs to be at an altitude of at least 86 blocks, so you can breathe fresh air.
power.originlayer.phasing.name: Phasing
power.originlayer.phasing.description: While phantomized, you can walk through solid material, except Obsidian.
power.originlayer.invisibility.name: Invisibility
power.originlayer.hunger_over_time.name: Fast Metabolism
power.originlayer.hunger_over_time.descr: Being phantomized causes you to become hungry.
power.originlayer.burn_in_daylight.name: Photoallergic
power.originlayer.burn_in_daylight.descr: You begin to burn in daylight if you are not invisible.
power.originlayer.fall_immunity.name: Acrobatics
power.originlayer.fall_immunity.descript: You never take fall damage, no matter from which height you fall.
power.originlayer.sprint_jump.name: Strong Ankles
power.originlayer.sprint_jump.descriptio: You are able to jump higher by jumping while sprinting.
power.originlayer.nine_lives.name: Nine Lives
power.originlayer.nine_lives.description: You have 1 less heart of health than humans.
power.originlayer.cat_vision.name: Nocturnal
power.originlayer.cat_vision.description: You can slightly see in the dark when not in water.
power.originlayer.weak_arms.name: Weak Arms
power.originlayer.weak_arms.description: When not under the effect of a strength potion, you can only mine natural stone if there are at most 2 other natural stone blocks adjacent to it.
power.originlayer.scare_creepers.name: Catlike Appearance
power.originlayer.scare_creepers.descrip: Creepers are scared of you and will only explode if you attack them first.
power.originlayer.launch_into_air.name: Gift of the Winds
power.originlayer.launch_into_air.descri: Every 30 seconds, you are able to launch about 20 blocks up into the air.
power.originlayer.elytra.name: Winged
power.originlayer.elytra.description: You have Elytra wings without needing to equip any.
power.originlayer.light_armor.name: Need for Mobility
power.originlayer.light_armor.descriptio: You can not wear any heavy armor (armor with protection values higher than chainmail).
power.originlayer.claustrophobia.name: Claustrophobia
power.originlayer.claustrophobia.descrip: Being somewhere with a low ceiling for too long will weaken you and make you slower.
power.originlayer.more_kinetic_damage.de: You take more damage from falling and flying into blocks.
power.originlayer.aerial_combatant.name: Aerial Combatant
power.originlayer.aerial_combatant.descr: You deal substantially more damage while in Elytra flight.
power.originlayer.throw_ender_pearl.name: Teleportation
power.originlayer.throw_ender_pearl.desc: Whenever you want, you may throw an ender pearl which deals no damage, allowing you to teleport.
power.originlayer.pumpkin_hate.name: Scared of Gourds
power.originlayer.pumpkin_hate.descripti: You are afraid of pumpkins. For a good reason.
power.originlayer.extra_reach.name: Slender Body
power.originlayer.extra_reach.descriptio: You can reach blocks and entities further away.
power.originlayer.shulker_inventory.name: Hoarder
power.originlayer.shulker_inventory.desc: You have access to an additional 9 slots of inventory, which keep the items on death.
power.originlayer.natural_armor.name: Sturdy Skin
power.originlayer.natural_armor.descript: Even without wearing armor, your skin provides natural protection.
power.originlayer.more_exhaustion.name: Large Appetite
power.originlayer.more_exhaustion.descri: You exhaust much quicker than others, thus requiring you to eat more.
power.originlayer.no_shield.name: Unwieldy
power.originlayer.no_shield.description: The way your hands are formed provide no way of holding a shield upright.
power.originlayer.strong_arms.name: Strong Arms
power.originlayer.strong_arms.descriptio: You are strong enough to break natural stones without using a pickaxe.
power.originlayer.translucent.name: Translucent
power.originlayer.end_spawn.name: End Inhabitant
power.originlayer.end_spawn.description: Your journey begins in the End.
power.originlayer.master_of_webs.name: Master of Webs
power.originlayer.master_of_webs.descrip: You navigate cobweb perfectly, and are able to climb in them. When you hit an enemy in melee, they get stuck in cobweb for a while. Non-arthropods stuck in cobweb will be sensed by you. You are able to craft cobweb from string.
power.originlayer.lay_eggs.name: Oviparous
power.originlayer.lay_eggs.description: Whenever you wake up in the morning, you will lay an egg.
power.originlayer.phantomize.name: Phantom Form
power.originlayer.phantomize.description: You can switch between human and phantom form at will, but only while you are saturated enough to sprint.
power.originlayer.like_air.name: Like Air
power.originlayer.like_air.description: Modifiers to your walking speed also apply while you're airborne.
power.originlayer.velvet_paws.name: Velvet Paws
power.originlayer.velvet_paws.descriptio: Your footsteps don't cause any vibrations which could otherwise be picked up by nearby lifeforms.
